item.title: Photography
item.description: I have always been interested in the beautiful things in life and aestethics of photos. When my wife was pregnant with our first child I bought myself a camera to be able to capture (hopefully) good pictures of our son and us as a family. This turned, faster then I thought, into a hobby.
